name: 楊勝明
objective:
本課程介紹電力電子電路的原理及應用，內容包括：(1)整流器，(2)AC-DC轉換器，(3)DC-DC轉換器，(4)電源供應器，(5)DC-AC轉換器，(6)共振式轉換器。
This course introduces basic operation principles and applications of power electronic circuits. Course content includes: (1) rectifier, (2) AC-DC converters, (3) DC-DC converters, (4) Power supply, (5) DC-AC converters, and (6) resonant converters.
schedule:
1. Introduction (ch.1)
2. Power computations (ch. 2)
3. Half-wave rectifiers (ch.3)
4. Full-wave rectifiers (ch.4)
5. Full-wave rectifiers (ch.4)
6. AC Voltage controllers (ch.5)
7. DC to DC converters (ch.6)
8. DC to DC converters (ch.6)
9. Mid-term exam.
10. DC to DC converters (ch.6)
11. DC power supplies (ch.7)
12. DC power supplies (ch.7)
13. DC power supplies (ch.7)
14. Inverters (ch.8)
15. Inverters (ch.8)
16. Resonant converters (ch.9)
17. Resonant converters (ch.9)
18.Final exam.
scorePolicy:
Homework and Quiz: 30%
Mid-term Exam.: 35%
Final Exam.: 35%
materials:
Text: "Power Electronics", Daniel Hart, McGraw Hill, 東華書局
